title: Went to Chandni chowk today and this creepy uncle started explaining his fantasies.
selftext:
Hi guys, do I went to Chandni chowk today and was trying to park my scooter, suddenly this old uncle who was standing infront of his shop looked at me and asked me to park infront of his shop, I was greatful for that. After that he called me inside his shop (he owned a jewelery shop) as I wear studs in my ear I went inside to start exploring stuff. 

Suddenly he started saying weird things like I can't discuss a few things with my children and said do you talk to girls and stuff like that after that he said "ek aadmi 3 cheezen nahi chor sakta khana, hagna mutna aur chodna" after this I was a little scared so started to record whatever I can, here it is.
